tgt_original: sambhavanti sadā nātha bodhicitta namo'stu te ||11 ||
ratnatrayaṃ mahāyānaṃ tvattaḥ sthāvarajaṅgamam |  caidhātukamidaṃ sarvaṃ jagaddīra namo'stu te ||12 ||
śiṣyo bhūmau samāropya śradvayā jānumaṇḍalam |  adhyeṣayīta śāstraṃ stotreṇānena māñjaliḥ ||8 ||
jñātaṃ me'nuttaraṃ tattvaṃ prasādāt te guṇārṇava |
yathā śrīcittavajreṇa tathā nātha prasīda me ||15 ||
bhavatpādāmbuje tyaktvā nānyā me vidyate gatiḥ |
samutpādya kṛpāṃ śiṣyaṃ āhuya gaṇamaṇḍale ||17 ||  pañcakāmaguṇākīrṇe vitānavitatojjvale |
anujñāṃ ca tato dadyāt tasmai buddhāgrasūnave ||26 ||
adya me saphalaṃ janma saphalaṃ jīvitaṃ ca me |
bodhaye na ca me kāṅkṣā prahīṇāḥ sarvavāsanāḥ ||32 ||
nipatya pādayorbhaktyā prahṛṣṭotphullalocanaḥ |  yad yadiṣṭataraṃ dravyaṃ tat tadeva nivedayet ||33 ||
yāṃ vibhāvya na saṃsāre ghore dustaravāridhau |  nirvāṇe'pi na tiṣṭhanti yoginaḥ svārthamātrake ||2 ||
na śrūnyabhāvanāṃ kuryāt nāpi cāśrūnyabhāvanām |  na śrūnyaṃ santyajed yogī na cāśrūnyaṃ parityajet ||5 ||
sattvo nāmāsti nāstīti na caivaṃ parikalpayet |
pañcaskandhādikān dharmān nātikrāmati yo na ca |
ekībhūtā dhiyā sārddhaṃ gagane gaganaṃ yathā ||11 ||
na ya ca bhāvakaḥ kaścit nāpi kācid vibhāvanā |  bhāvanīyaṃ na caivāsti socyate tattvabhāvanā ||12 ||
